price: 48. En gedenk Ismaël, en Elyisha en Dhoel Kifl, allen behoren tot de besten.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلۡيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ وَكُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَخۡيَارِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur is'māʿīla wal-yasaʿa wadhā al-kif'li wakullun mina al-akhyāri
